meanings.definition: The state of being secretive or hidden.
meanings.sent1: Her covertness in the game of hide-and-seek always led to her winning.
meanings.sent2: The covertness of the spy's actions made it difficult for anyone to discover his true identity.
meanings.sent3: The cat's covertness in sneaking up on the mouse was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The covertness of the ninja was like a shadow, unseen and unheard.
meanings.sent5: The covertness of the treasure's location was so well-guarded that no one could find it.

meanings.definition: The quality of being concealed or disguised.
meanings.sent1: The covertness of the trap was so well done that even the most cautious animals fell for it.
meanings.sent2: The covertness of the chameleon's camouflage allowed it to blend seamlessly into its surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The covertness of the magician's tricks left the audience in awe and wonder.
meanings.sent4: The covertness of the spy's disguise was so convincing that even his closest friends didn't recognize him.
meanings.sent5: The covertness of the hidden passage was revealed only to those who knew where to look.
